song_lyrics: Ghanshyām pūraṇkām bhaj man pragaṭ Swāmīnārāyaṇam
Paṭrang shvet abhang bhūshaṇ angchhavī atimangalam
Bhuvi sant param ekānt Akshar Guṇātītam dhārīṇam
Guru Prāgjī Yagnapurush Gnānjī Pramukh hradayvihāriṇam
title: Ghanshyām pūraṇkām bhaj man pragaṭ Swāmīnārāyaṇam

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-27: unknown

Category: Shri Harina Pad
